name: atria
description: Atria is a tool for server orchestration, application deployment, and multi-node setup with web-based configuration. It targets developers deploying web apps across multiple servers.
features: Server Orchestration: Manage multiple servers from one interface. Centralized control.
Application Deployment: Deploy web apps across infrastructure easily. Simplified deployment.
Multi-Node Setup: Configure and manage distributed systems. Scale horizontally.
Web Configuration: Browser-based setup and management. No SSH needed.
Developer-Focused: Tools designed for web application deployment. Built for devs.
Infrastructure Management: Control entire server infrastructure. Complete oversight.
Automated Deployment: Streamline app deployment workflows. Faster releases.
Self-Hosted: Run your own orchestration platform. Full control.
